application_id.description: ID of the application this interaction is for

data.note-field: This is always present on application command, message component, and modal submit interaction types. It is optional for future-proofing against new interaction types

guild_id.description: Guild that the interaction was sent from

channel_id.description: Channel that the interaction was sent from

member.description: Guild member data for the invoking user, including permissions
member.note-field: member is sent when the interaction is invoked in a guild, and user is sent when invoked in a DM

user.description: User object for the invoking user, if invoked in a DM

token.description: Continuation token for responding to the interaction

message.description: For components, the message they were attached to

app_permissions.description: Bitwise set of permissions the app or bot has within the channel the interaction was sent from

locale.description: Selected language of the invoking user
locale.note-field: This is available on all interaction types except PING

guild_locale.description: Guild's preferred locale, if invoked in a guild

id.description: the ID of the invoked command

name.description: the name of the invoked command

type.description: the type of the invoked command

options.type: array of application command interaction data option
options.description: the params + values from the user
options.note-field: This can be partial when in response to APPLICATION_COMMAND_AUTOCOMPLETE

guild_id.description: the id of the guild the command is registered to

target_id.description: id of the user or message targeted by a user or message command

values.description: values the user selected in a select menu component
values.note-field: This is always present for select menu components

components.description: the values submitted by the user

users.type: Map of Snowflakes to user objects

members.type: Map of Snowflakes to partial member objects
members.description: the ids and partial Member objects
members.note-field: Partial Member objects are missing user, deaf and mute fields

roles.type: Map of Snowflakes to role objects

channels.type: Map of Snowflakes to partial channel objects
channels.description: the ids and partial Channel objects
channels.note-field: Partial Channel objects only have id, name, type and permissions fields. Threads will also have thread_metadata and parent_id fields.

messages.type: Map of Snowflakes to partial messages objects
messages.description: the ids and partial Message objects

attachments.type: Map of Snowflakes to attachment objects

name.description: Name of the application command, including subcommands and subcommand groups

member.description: Member who invoked the interaction in the guild
